messages.subject: Re: Okay... Questions...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oeyo (1579-1632) Married Tokugawa Hidetada, gave him 7 children. Yodo (d.1616) Mother of Hideyori Hatsu - I don t seem to have any info on her. Manpukumaru
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Nate Ledbetter
<ltdomer98@y...> wrote:
>
> --- Eponymous13@a... wrote:
> QUESTIONS:
> and how many
> > kids did she give Asai?
> > I've seen 3 daughters pretty consistently, but was
> > it one son or two?
>
> I'm fairly sure it was one--Manpukumaru. Dates, I
> can't help you off the top of my head.
>

Oeyo (1579-1632) Married Tokugawa Hidetada, gave him 7 children.
Yodo (d.1616) Mother of Hideyori
Hatsu - I don't seem to have any info on her.
Manpukumaru - killed by Nobunaga.

messages.subject: Okay... Questions...
messages.msgSnippet: Hey all... I ve seen several dates mentioned, but there are things which still puzzle me about this one topic... QUESTIONS: When was O-ichi given in marriage
messages.messageBody:
Hey all...
I've seen several dates mentioned, but there are things which still
puzzle me about this one topic... QUESTIONS: When was O-ichi given in marriage
to Shibata the FIRST time, when were they made to divorce and when was she made
to marry Asai?! I've seen dates as early as 1557 for the first, and anywhere
from 1563 to 1567 for the second two... and how many kids did she give Asai?
I've seen 3 daughters pretty consistently, but was it one son or two? Thanks
in advance! :-D Take care, y'all...

Tim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
